summary: Feature request to expose the Initiator enum through WorkflowInfo, allowing workflows to determine whether execution was triggered by retry, continue-as-new, cron, or other mechanisms.
userImpact: Users need visibility into why a workflow execution was initiated to implement conditional logic based on restart cause.
proposedFix: Expose startWorkflow.continueInitiator as WorkflowInfo.more.initiator with the Initiator enum values
keyQuote: One possible use case is determining whether the current Execution was initiated due to retry vs continue as new.
